definition: to pick/to pluck/to collect/to select/to choose/to gather
color/complexion/looks/variant of 彩[cai3]/variant of 採|采[cai3]
threshing floor/classifier for events and happenings: spell, episode, bout
large place used for a specific purpose/stage/scene (of a play)/classifier for sporting or recreational activities/classifier for number of exams

sentences.english: Collapse of stope roof, is one of disasters occuring at underground mines.
sentences.chinese: 矿山采场顶板冒落是地下矿山开采中常见的灾害。

sentences.english: Attachment air is one of the important characteristics of the air-flow structure in flat chamber stopes.
sentences.chinese: 附壁风流是扁平型峒室采场风流结构的重要特征之一。

sentences.english: Analysis on the factors influencing stress-strain of mining field and mine roadway;
sentences.chinese: 采场管理是矿山井下生产工作中的一个关键性环节。

sentences.english: But the beam model is an approximate model in studying the roof problems.
sentences.chinese: 但用梁模型来研究采场顶板问题具有相当的近似性。

sentences.english: Stope management is one of important tasks in mining activity underground.
sentences.chinese: 采场管理是矿山井下生产工作中的一个关键性环节。

sentences.english: Liquid fluid system is the key part of in-site leaching.
sentences.chinese: 采场液流系统的研究是就地浸出的关键技术之一。

sentences.english: Fault tree analysis for collapse of roadways with fractured surrounding rock and high tectonic stress in jinchuan mine no.
sentences.chinese: 金川二矿区不良岩层采场巷道片帮冒顶事故树分析。

sentences.english: Stability of side slope is the basic guarantee for normal production of the opencast stope.
sentences.chinese: 边坡稳定是露天采场生产正常进行的基础保障。

sentences.english: Stope rock-fall is the main style of safety accidents in underground metal mine.
sentences.chinese: 采场冒落是金属矿地下开采安全事故的主要形式。

sentences.english: Collapse of stope roofs is one of disasters occurring at underground mines.
sentences.chinese: 矿山采场顶板冒落是地下矿山开采中常见的灾害。

sentences.english: Based on the key stratum theory, the structure characteristics and movement laws of overlying strata with different mining height are studied.
sentences.chinese: 运用关键层理论研究了采场覆岩结构特征及运动规律。

sentences.english: The liquid flow system of a stope is a key for stope leaching.
sentences.chinese: 采场液流系统的研究是就地浸出的关键技术之一。

sentences.english: Water drainage in hollow open pit stope is a key link of production.
sentences.chinese: 凹陷露天采场排水是一个十分重要的生产工艺环节。

definition: waste rock (mining)/gangue (worthless minerals mixed in with coal or ore)
mining waste/waste remaining after processing ore/tailings
